sentences.sContent: Some of the best effects in my garden have been the result of serendipity.
sentences.sCn: 我花园里最珍贵的几件物品是机缘巧合之下意外所得。

remMethod.val: 出自18世纪英国作家Horace(荷拉斯)的童话故事The Three Princes of Serendip， 书中主人公具有随处发现珍宝的本领

trans.tranCn: 有意外发现珍宝的运气
trans.tranOther: Serendipity is the luck some people have in finding or creating interesting or valuable things by chance
